member.name: IInputObject2.TranslateAcceleratorGlobal
member.summary: Handles global accelerators so that input objects can respond to the keyboard even when they are not active in the UI.
member.param: A pointer to an structure that contains a keyboard message.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInputObject2
member.summary: Exposes a method that extends by handling global accelerators.
